task.title: JavaScript and Chrome Development Tools
task.shortdesc: Viewing the Chrone Development console. test

context.p: Use the Chrome Development console to debug errors that can occur when JavaScript is run.

step.cmd: Open the Developer Tools and click the Console Tab.
At the > prompt, enter the JavaScript code to be evaluated.
If the JavaScript code evaluates correctly, you can enter this code into your script.
If the JavaScript code does not evaluate correctly, determine what is causing the error. The error could be caused by a typo or misuse of a command.
Once you have determined the cause of the error, return to step 2.
Continue to debug all errors until there are not any left to debug.
